note.p: Manservant. Manservant at Binswood Terrace West, Leamington, 1841. Butler at 34 Clarendon Square, Leamington, 1851. Butler in Leamington, Warwickshire, to Violetta Galton, Francis Galton’s mother, 1861, 1871. Retired and living in Milverton, Leamington, 1881.

Census returns of England and Wales 1841 (The National Archives: Public Record Office HO107/1135/16/18/30), 1851 (HO107/2072/554/14), 1861 (RG9/2223/115/34), 1871 (RG10/3196/108/20), 1881 (RG11/3094/124/38)
